title: Advanced Critical Theory and Literary Analysis

vocab.definition: Critical approach revealing contradictions and instability in texts
Analysis using psychological theories to interpret literature
Relationship between texts through references and influences
Analysis examining class struggle and economic forces in literature
Contrasting pairs of concepts that structure meaning

teachingNotes: Explore complex theoretical approaches. Analyze how different theories reveal different meanings in same text.

sample.question: What critical approach reveals contradictions in texts?

truefalse.question: Intertextuality describes relationship between texts through references.

multiplechoice.question: What criticism examines class struggle and economic forces?

fillintheblank.question: Contrasting pairs structuring meaning are ________ oppositions.

shortanswer.question: How does psychoanalytic criticism interpret character behavior?
